on reading compounds: 君子【クンシ】man of virtue, wise man, (true) gentleman, person of high rank, the four gentlemen (plum, chrysanthemum, orchid, and bamboo)
名君【メイクン】wise ruler, enlightened monarch, benevolent lord
kun reading compounds: 君【きみ】you, buddy, pal, monarch, ruler, sovereign, (one's) master
君が代【きみがよ】Imperial reign, Kimigayo (Japanese national anthem)
大君【おおきみ】emperor, king, prince
